data.title: Mark Riebe: Sins of the Father (7/28/19
data.meta_description: Blog containing detailed and researched write-ups about missing persons cases.
data.text: Missing persons cases and unexplained deaths have always intrigued me. So many unanswered questions. Moderating an "Unsolved Mysteries" message board for over 10 years only heIped to fuel my desire to try to get answers for these cases. I will be writing and doing podcasts about some of these perplexing stories. We hope to try to get some attention to these stories without endings. Join us as we discuss the lost and the found...
